mapper.select: SELECT p.p_name, c.c_payment, c.c_rental_cnt, c.c_return_cnt, c.c_payment, c.c_status , to_char(c.c_regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') c_regdate FROM calculate c, place p where c.p_num = p.p_num and c.p_num in(SELECT p_num FROM place where m_id = #{m_id})

select p.p_name, p.p_num, (select count(*) from rental where s_no in(select s_no from stadium where p_num = p.p_num) and cal_status = 0 and r_pay_status = 1 and to_char(r_reserve_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') < to_char(sysdate - 15, 'yyyy/MM/dd')) c_rental_cnt, (select count(*) from rental where s_no in(select s_no from stadium where p_num = p.p_num) and cal_status = 0 and r_pay_status = -1 and to_char(r_reserve_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') < to_char(sysdate - 15, 'yyyy/MM/dd')) c_return_cnt, nvl((select sum(r_total_pay) from rental where s_no in(select s_no from stadium where p_num = p.p_num) and to_char(r_reserve_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') < to_char(sysdate - 15, 'yyyy/MM/dd') and cal_status = 0 and r_pay_status in(1, -1)), 0) - nvl((select sum(r_total_pay) from rental where s_no in(select s_no from stadium where p_num = p.p_num) and to_char(r_reserve_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') < to_char(sysdate - 15, 'yyyy/MM/dd') and cal_status = 0 and r_pay_status = -1), 0) + nvl((select sum(refund) from rental where s_no in(Select s_no from stadium where p_num = p.p_num) and to_char(r_reserve_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') < to_char(sysdate - 15, 'yyyy/MM/dd') and cal_status = 0 and r_pay_status = -1), 0) c_payment from place p where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update rental set cal_status = -1 where s_no in(select s_no from stadium where p_num = #{p_num}) and cal_status = 0 and to_char(r_reserve_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') < to_char(sysdate - 15, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and r_pay_status in(-1, 1)
